pages.text: A more fancy sword pedestal, compared to the normal one.$(br2)While a $(item)Stone Brick$() will result in the default color, any other $(item)stone$() or $(item)storage block$() may be used, to get an pedestal of that kind.
$(br)please note that you will recive the corret pedestal, based on the used block, even if this page, JEI and the stonecutter show otherwise
